thread.title: Rebels kill at least 7 civilians in attacks in eastern DRC
thread.title_full: Rebels kill at least 7 civilians in attacks in eastern DRC | News24

author: news24.com
title: Rebels kill at least 7 civilians in attacks in eastern DRC
text:
Kinshasa - A representative of civil society groups in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo says rebels have killed at least seven civilians in two attacks.
Omar Kavota said on Monday that rebels from the Allied Defence Forces-NALU launched attacks against DRC’s military and during clashes in Mukoko four civilians were killed.
Kavota said members of the group also attacked the army in Tenambo, killing three civilians and injuring four. Fighting continued in the villages near the town of Beni in DRC’s North Kivu province.
Kavota, the executive director of the rights group, said many families were forced to flee.
